advisory.name: RLBA-2021:1942
advisory.synopsis: ibus-typing-booster bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for ibus-typing-booster is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation EnterpriseLinux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: [ibus-typing-booster] In gnome Wayland, while deleting with backspace, previously entered keywords appear repetitively in gedit.
